TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ViewTechnology extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义设计器宿主所支持的技术集的标识符。

span.span: Defines identifiers for a set of technologies that designer hosts support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图适配器模型替换功能并向功能中添加功能 ; 但是， 如果选择，则会保留该功能以实现向后兼容性和将来使用。The view adapter model replaces and adds functionality to the feature; however, the feature is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 定义标识符，这些标识符可指示用于控制设计器承载的文档显示的模式。 defines identifiers that can indicate the mode to use for controlling the display of a designer-hosted document. 只应 `Default` 在设计器宿主环境中使用该值。You should only use the `Default` value in your designer hosting environment. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中， `ViewTechnology` 枚举指定了根设计器支持的 UI 模型的类型。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, the `ViewTechnology` enumeration specified the type of UI model supported by a root designer. 由于此模型不是可扩展的，因此您应该改用 *视图适配器* 模型。Because this model is not extensible, you should instead use a *view adapter* model. 视图适配器是一种将一种类型的对象改编为另一种类型的类型。A view adapter is a type that adapts an object of one type to another. 例如，HTML 设计器可能会返回 `DemoDOM` 树作为其视图。For example, an HTML designer might return a `DemoDOM` tree as its view. HTML 设计器返回的视图技术 `Default` 。The HTML designer returns a view technology of `Default`. Windows 窗体宿主环境会有一个或多个视图适配器类。A Windows Forms hosting environment would have one or more view adapter classes available. 如果一个这样的类可以将转换为 `DemoDOM` Windows 窗体控件，则宿主应用程序可以支持此类设计器。If one such class could convert the `DemoDOM` into a Windows Forms control, the hosting application can support this type of designer. 如果适配器无法处理从设计器的方法返回的数据类型 ，设计器加载将失败，并且会显示一个错误。If no adapter can handle the data type returned from the designer's method, the load of the designer will fail, and the user will be presented with an error. Visual Studio 具有用于提供视图适配器的可扩展方案，因此它可以适应任何 UI 技术。Visual Studio has an extensible scheme for providing view adapters, so it can adapt to any UI technology. 第三方技术提供商还可以提供适当的视图适配器，并可立即使用其对象模型。Third-party technology providers can also offer an appropriate view adapter, and their object models are immediately consumable. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 `ViewTechnology.Default` 在设计器中使用。The following example demonstrates how to use `ViewTechnology.Default` in a designer. 此示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何在设计器中使用 "视图技术> 枚举。The following example demonstrates how to use the \`ViewTechnology> enumeration in a designer. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Default = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定默认的视图技术支持。

span.span: Specifies the default view technology support.

summary.span: 根设计器可以返回任何类型的对象，但该对象必须与用于宿主技术的适配器兼容。

span.span: The root designer may return any type of object, but the object must be compatible with an adapter for the technology of the host.

summary.span: 诸如 Visual Studio 之类的托管环境提供了一种插入新视图技术适配器的方法。

span.span: Hosting environments such as Visual Studio provide a way to plug in new view technology adapters.

summary.span: Windows 窗体设计器的默认视图对象是 实例。

span.span: The default view object for the Windows Forms designer is a instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Passthrough = int32(0)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]
[<System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

[<System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

summary.span: 表示将视图对象直接传递给开发环境的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which the view object is passed directly to the development environment.

summary.span: 视图对象必须实现开发环境所需的任何接口。

span.span: The view object must implement any interfaces the development environment requires.

summary.span: Visual Studio 开发环境支持以下视图对象：ActiveX 控件、活动文档，或实现 `IVsWindowPane` 接口的对象，该接口通过 Visual Studio VSI（Visual Studio 集成）程序提供。

span.span: The Visual Studio development environment supports view objects that are either an ActiveX control, active document, or an object that implements the `IVsWindowPane` interface that is available through the Visual Studio VSI (Visual Studio Integration) program.

summary.span: Visual Studio 开发环境为此视图技术提供支持。

span.span: The Visual Studio development environment provides support for this view technology.

summary.span: 并非所有开发环境都支持此视图技术。

span.span: Support for this view technology is not necessarily available in all development environments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology WindowsForms = int32(1)

summary.span: 表示由 Windows 窗体控件对象为根设计器提供显示的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which a Windows Forms control object provides the display for the root designer.

summary.span: 设计器宿主使用 Windows 窗体控件填充开发环境文档窗口。

span.span: The designer host fills the development environment document window with the Windows Forms control.
